comment: Equality of a class variable and a class abstraction. In this version, the fact that ` x ` is a non-free variable in ` A ` is explicitly stated as a hypothesis. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 11-May-2017.) Avoid ~ ax-13 . (Revised by Wolf Lammen, 13-May-2023.)
